title: Profile Management
noProfileSelected: No profile selected, click to add

mappingMode.passthroughDesc: Use the original model from the request without any modifications. Suitable for direct integration with Anthropic API or compatible services.
mappingMode.overrideDesc: Force the use of a specified target model, ignoring the model parameter in the request. Suitable for unified use of a specific model.
mappingMode.mapDesc: Transform models based on mapping rules. You can specify different target models for different original models.

mappingRules.title: Mapping Rules:
mappingRules.regexExample: (e.g., claude-.*-opus.* matches all models containing opus)

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Delete
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete profile "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

errors.overrideModelRequired: Target model is required in override mode
